parameters.prompt: dream pop, melancholic, nostalgic, shimmering guitars, soft synths, whispery vocals, lo-fi warmth
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The streetlights hum a lullaby, flickering like fireflies, we used to dance beneath their glow, but now the night just hears my sighs [chorus] Time rewinds in Polaroid frames, static smiles and faded names, I still hear the echoes calling, through the halls of yesterday [verse] Your laughs a ghost in every room, a vinyl skipping out of tune, the autumn leaves still fall so slow, but they dont taste the same, you know [chorus] Time rewinds in Polaroid frames, static smiles and faded names, I still hear the echoes calling, through the halls of yesterday [bridge] Maybe seasons change their minds, maybe clocks can walk backwards this time, maybe if I close my eyes tight, well be 2AM alibis [outro] The streetlights hum a lullaby...
